background_description: The background consists of dark, murky aquatic environment with visible suspended particulate matter. Blurred, yellowish-green elements are visible in the upper background, possibly indicating distant plant life or algae.
explanation: The image clearly shows a Pufferfish with distinct yellow-green coloration and intricate dark patterns on its body. Its bright colors and sharp contrast against the dark, murky background ensure it stands out, indicating a complete absence of camouflage.
